trans-unit.source: Encapsulates a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton" /> controls for use by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar" /> class.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection> is a zero-based indexed collection used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> class to hold all the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> controls assigned to the toolbar.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection>是从零开始的索引的集合使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>类来保存所有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>分配给工具栏的控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Add%2A> method to add individual buttons and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Remove%2A> method to delete them.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Add%2A>方法将添加各个按钮和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Remove%2A>方法将其删除。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Clear%2A> method to remove all the buttons from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Clear%2A>方法从集合中移除所有的按钮。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates and initializes a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> and three <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> controls.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建并初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>和三个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>控件。

trans-unit.source: The toolbar buttons are assigned to the toolbar and the toolbar is added to the form.
trans-unit.target: 工具栏按钮分配给工具栏和工具栏添加到窗体。

trans-unit.source: This code requires that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> has already been created.
trans-unit.target: 此代码需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>已创建。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar" /> that is the parent of the collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton" /> controls.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection" /> class and assigns it to the specified toolbar.
You do not typically create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection> and explicitly call its constructor.
trans-unit.target: 你通常不创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection>和显式调用其构造函数。

trans-unit.source: By referencing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Buttons%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> control, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection> is created.
trans-unit.target: 通过引用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Buttons%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>控件，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection>创建。

trans-unit.source: You can then gain access to its properties and methods, and assign <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> controls to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以访问其属性和方法，并分配<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>控件添加到集合。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new toolbar button to the end of the toolbar button collection.
The text to display on the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton" />.
Adds a new toolbar button to the end of the toolbar button collection with the specified <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton.Text" /> property value.
The zero-based index value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton" /> added to the collection.

You can also add new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> objects to the collection by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.AddRange%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Insert%2A> methods, or the other version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以添加新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>到通过使用集合的对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.AddRange%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Insert%2A>方法或另一个版本的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Add%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To remove a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> that you have previously added, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.RemoveAt%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Clear%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要删除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>您之前添加，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Remove%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.RemoveAt%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Clear%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example removes an existing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> from a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> control if it exists and adds and inserts four new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例中删除现有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>控制如果它存在和添加并插入四个新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>对象添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> control on it.
trans-unit.target: 此示例要求你拥有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>上的控件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton" /> to be added after all existing buttons.
Adds the specified toolbar button to the end of the toolbar button collection.
The zero-based index value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton" /> added to the collection.

You can also add new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> objects to the collection by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.AddRange%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Insert%2A> methods, or the other version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以添加新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>到通过使用集合的对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.AddRange%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Insert%2A>方法或另一个版本的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Add%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To remove a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> that you have previously added, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.RemoveAt%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Clear%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要删除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>您之前添加，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Remove%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.RemoveAt%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Clear%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> control to an existing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> with existing buttons.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例添加一个新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>控制到一个现有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>具有现有按钮。

trans-unit.source: The toolbar button will be added to the end of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Buttons%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection.
trans-unit.target: 工具栏按钮将添加到的末尾<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Buttons%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton" /> controls to add to this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection" /> contained in an array.
Adds a collection of toolbar buttons to this toolbar button collection.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> objects contained in the `nodes` array are appended to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>中所含对象`nodes`数组追加到集合的末尾。

trans-unit.source: You can use method to quickly add a group of previously created <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> objects to the collection instead of manually adding each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> to the collection using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用方法将一组快速添加之前创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>到而不是手动添加每个集合对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>集合使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Add%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To remove a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> that you have previously added, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.RemoveAt%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Clear%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要删除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>您之前添加，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Remove%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.RemoveAt%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Clear%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example removes an existing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> from a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> control if it exists and adds and inserts four new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例中删除现有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>控制如果它存在和添加并插入四个新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>对象添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> control on it.
trans-unit.target: 此示例要求你拥有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>上的控件。

trans-unit.source: Removes all buttons from the toolbar button collection.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Clear%2A> method iterates through the collection and removes all toolbar buttons assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Clear%2A>方法循环访问集合，并删除分配给所有工具栏按钮<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection>。

trans-unit.source: To remove an individual toolbar button from the collection, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Remove%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.RemoveAt%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要从集合中移除单个工具栏按钮，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Remove%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.RemoveAt%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To add new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> objects to the collection, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.AddRange%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Insert%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要添加新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>的对象添加到集合中，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Add%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.AddRange%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Insert%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Count%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Buttons%2A> before and after the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Clear%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例显示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Count%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Buttons%2A>之前和之后<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Clear%2A>调用方法。

trans-unit.source: This code requires that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> with at least one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> has been created.
trans-unit.target: 此代码需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>至少有一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>已创建。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton" /> to locate in the collection.
Determines if the specified toolbar button is a member of the collection.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton" /> is a member of the collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

This method enables you to determine whether a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> is member of the collection before attempting to perform operations on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于确定是否<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>是其成员的集合，然后再尝试执行操作<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to confirm that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> has been added to or is still a member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此方法以确认<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>已添加到或仍是集合的成员。

trans-unit.source: The following code example removes an existing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> from a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> control if it exists and adds and inserts four new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例中删除现有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>控制如果它存在和添加并插入四个新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>对象添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> control on it.
trans-unit.target: 此示例要求你拥有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>上的控件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton" /> to search for.
Determines if a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton" /> with the specified key is contained in the collection.
<see langword="true" /> to indicate a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton" /> with the specified key is found; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton.Name%2A> property corresponds to the key for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton.Name%2A>属性对应的密钥<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The key comparison is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 键比较不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: If the `key` parameter is `null` or an empty string, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Item%2A> returns `false.`
trans-unit.target: 如果`key`参数是`null`或空字符串，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Item%2A>返回 `false.`

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of buttons in the toolbar button collection.
The number of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton" /> controls assigned to the toolbar.
trans-unit.target: 数<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton" />分配给工具栏的控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Count%2A> property holds the actual number of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> controls assigned to the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Count%2A>属性存储的实际数目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>分配给集合的控件。

trans-unit.source: It is common to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Count%2A> property value as the upper bounds of a loop to iterate through a collection.
trans-unit.target: 它是常见的是使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Count%2A>作为上限的一个循环来循环访问集合的属性值。

trans-unit.source: The index value of a collection is a zero-based index, so you must subtract one from the looping variable otherwise you will exceed the upper bounds of the collection and throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 集合的索引值是从零开始的索引，因此你必须从减去 1 循环变量否则为你将超过集合的上限和引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Count%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Buttons%2A> before and after the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Clear%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例显示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Count%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Buttons%2A>之前和之后<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Clear%2A>调用方法。

trans-unit.source: This code requires that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> with at least one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> has been created.
trans-unit.target: 此代码需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>至少有一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>已创建。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that can be used to iterate through the toolbar button collection.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> that represents the tree node collection.

The following code example removes an existing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> from a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> control if it exists and adds and inserts four new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例中删除现有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>控制如果它存在和添加并插入四个新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>对象添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> control on it.
trans-unit.target: 此示例要求你拥有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>上的控件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton" /> to locate in the collection.
Retrieves the index of the specified toolbar button in the collection.
The zero-based index of the item found in the collection; otherwise, -1.
This method gives you easy access to the index value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使你能够轻松访问的索引值到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>集合中。

trans-unit.source: The index value allows you to easily determine which <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> was clicked on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>.
trans-unit.target: 索引值，您可以轻松地确定哪些<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>上被单击<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> clicked can be determined by evaluating the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.IndexOf%2A> value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs.Button%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>单击可以评估来确定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.IndexOf%2A>值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs.Button%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> and three <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> controls.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>和三个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>控件。

trans-unit.source: The toolbar buttons are assigned to the button collection, the collection is assigned to the toolbar, and the toolbar is added to the form.
trans-unit.target: 工具栏按钮分配给按钮集合，集合将分配到工具栏，而工具栏添加到窗体。

trans-unit.source: On the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ButtonClick> event of the toolbar, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs.Button%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs> is evaluated, and the appropriate dialog box opened.
trans-unit.target: 上<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ButtonClick>事件工具栏上，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs.Button%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs>计算的值，并打开相应的对话框。

trans-unit.source: This code requires that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OpenFileDialog>, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SaveFileDialog>, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> have all been created.
trans-unit.target: 此代码需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>、 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OpenFileDialog>、 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SaveFileDialog>，和一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>所有已创建。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton" /> to search for.
Retrieves the index of the first occurrence of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton" /> with the specified key.
The index of the first occurrence of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton" /> with the specified key, if found; otherwise, -1.

If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.IndexOfKey%2A> is called successively, the last returned index will be checked for a key match first, and if there is no match, the search starts at the beginning of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.IndexOfKey%2A>连续，最后调用返回索引将首先，检查的键的匹配项，如果没有匹配项，从集合的开头开始搜索。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton.Name%2A> property corresponds to the key for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton.Name%2A>属性对应的密钥<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The key comparison is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 键比较不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: If the `key` parameter is `null` or an empty string, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Item%2A> returns -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果`key`参数是`null`或空字符串，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Item%2A>返回-1。

trans-unit.source: The indexed location within the collection to insert the toolbar button.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton" /> to insert.
Inserts an existing toolbar button in the toolbar button collection at the specified location.

You can also add new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> objects to the collection by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Add%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.AddRange%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以添加新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>到通过使用集合的对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Add%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.AddRange%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To remove a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> that you have previously added, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.RemoveAt%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Clear%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要删除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>您之前添加，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Remove%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.RemoveAt%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Clear%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example removes an existing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> from a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> control if it exists and adds and inserts four new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例中删除现有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>控制如果它存在和添加并插入四个新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>对象添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> control on it.
trans-unit.target: 此示例要求你拥有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>上的控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the collection is read-only.
<see langword="true" /> if the collection is read-only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果该集合为只读，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example removes an existing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> from a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> control if it exists and adds and inserts four new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例中删除现有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>控制如果它存在和添加并插入四个新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>对象添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> control on it.
trans-unit.target: 此示例要求你拥有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>上的控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton" /> within the collection.
The indexed location of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton" /> in the collection.
Gets or sets the toolbar button at the specified indexed location in the toolbar button collection.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton" /> that represents the toolbar button at the specified indexed location.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton" />它表示位于指定索引位置的工具栏按钮。

trans-unit.source: To assign <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> controls to a specific location, or to retrieve them from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection>, you can reference the collection object with a specific index value.
trans-unit.target: 若要将分配<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>控制到特定位置，或检索从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection>，你可以引用具有特定的索引值的集合对象。

trans-unit.source: The index value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection> is a zero-based index.
trans-unit.target: 索引值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection>是从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The following code example replaces the last toolbar button on a toolbar.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将替换工具栏上的最后一个工具栏按钮。

trans-unit.source: This code requires that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> and at least one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> have been created.
trans-unit.target: 此代码需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>和至少一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>已创建。

trans-unit.source: The example gets the number of buttons on the toolbar and replaces the last button with a newly created one.
trans-unit.target: 示例获取在工具栏上的按钮的数目，并替换一个新创建的最后一个按钮。

trans-unit.source: The `index` value of the toolbar button being replaced is set to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Count%2A> property, minus one, since the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> collection is a zero-based index.
trans-unit.target: `index`被替换的工具栏按钮的值设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Count%2A>属性减 1，因为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>集合是一个从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="index" /> value is <see langword="null" />.
The <paramref name="index" /> value is less than zero.
-or-
The <paramref name="index" /> value is greater than the number of buttons in the collection, and the collection of buttons is not <see langword="null" />.
The name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton" /> to retrieve.
Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton" /> with the specified key from the collection.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton" /> whose <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton.Name" /> property matches the specified key.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton" />其<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton.Name" />属性指定的键相匹配。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton.Name%2A> property corresponds to the key for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton.Name%2A>属性对应的密钥<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The key comparison is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 键比较不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: If the `key` parameter is `null` or an empty string, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Item%2A> returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`key`参数是`null`或空字符串，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Item%2A>返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton" /> to remove from the collection.
Removes a given button from the toolbar button collection.

To remove toolbar buttons from the collection, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.RemoveAt%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Clear%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要从集合中移除工具栏按钮，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.RemoveAt%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Clear%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To add new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> objects to the collection, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.AddRange%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Insert%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要添加新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>的对象添加到集合中，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Add%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.AddRange%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Insert%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example removes an existing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> from a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> control if it exists and adds and inserts four new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例中删除现有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>控制如果它存在和添加并插入四个新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>对象添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> control on it.
trans-unit.target: 此示例要求你拥有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>上的控件。

trans-unit.source: The indexed location of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton" /> in the collection.
Removes a given button from the toolbar button collection.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Remove%2A> method removes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> at the specified location in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Remove%2A>方法移除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>中指定的位置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection>。

trans-unit.source: If you want to remove all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> controls from the collection, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要删除所有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>控件从该集合，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Clear%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example removes the last <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例中删除最后一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>上<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>。

trans-unit.source: The index value of the toolbar button being removed is set equal to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Count%2A> property, minus one, since the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> collection is a zero-based index.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的工具栏按钮的索引值设置为等于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Count%2A>属性减 1，因为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>集合是一个从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="index" /> value is less than 0, or it is greater than the number of buttons in the collection.
The name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton" /> to remove from the collection.
Removes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton" /> with the specified key from the collection.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton.Name%2A> property corresponds to the key for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton.Name%2A>属性对应的密钥<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that is the destination of the elements copied from <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Array" /> must have zero-based indexing.
The zero-based index in <c>dest</c> at which copying begins.
Copies the elements of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> to an <see cref="T:System.Array" />, starting at a particular <see cref="T:System.Array" /> index.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection> is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection> 被强制转换为 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the collection is synchronized (thread safe).
<see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton" /> to be added after all existing buttons.
Adds the specified toolbar button to the end of the toolbar button collection.
The zero-based index value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton" /> added to the collection.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
